Dimension 20

Dimension 20 is one of my all-time favourite actual plays. It is easier to jump into than a lot of other shows because it runs short campaigns, rather than ongoing epics.

It is part of Dropout, which is a paid streaming service. It has a lot of other comedy content outside of Dimension 20 that make it well worth the money â€“ in my humble opinion.

However, if you would like to see if this is something you would enjoy before watching, their entire first campaign, Fantasy High, is available on YouTube.
